import React from 'react' export default function Viewhoadon() { const formatCurrency = (number) => { return new Intl.NumberFormat('vi-VN', { style: 'currency', currency: 'VND' }).format(number); }; const [sanpham ,setData] = useState({}); const{ma_san_pham} = useParams(); useEffect(()=>{ axios.get(`http://localhost:5000/api/getsp/${ma_san_pham}`) .then((resp) => setData({...resp.data[0]})); },[ma_san_pham]); return (
